mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rapatel.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: On his departure from France, was charged with giving him a letter from M. de Lafayette; prevented from delivering it in person by service to General Moreau; would be happy if Jefferson had employment for him.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lafayette, Marie Joseph Paul Yves Roch Gilbert Du Motier, marquis de, 1757-1834
Moreau, Jean Victor Marie, 1763-1813
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1806 February 6, Philadelphia, [Pennsylvania] to [Thomas Jefferson], n.p.
